name: Jumpiggy vs The Slaughterhouse
description:
I've been working in this game for a long time, making a lot of redesigns and never been convinced of what this should look like, by now I'm not sure if I'm going to finish this, but I'd like to read some toughts about this game before making a choose. This is the most complete demo I've finished, but it is about 5 years old and has passed trough a lot of changes, visually and in-gameplay, I hope you enjoy this.

Story

Help Jumpiggy escape the Slaughterhouse in this platformer metroidvania game, here you control the Piggy, it never stops jumping! Make you way out in this bouncing twisted adventure.

Controls

A/D, Left/Right keys. Control left and right movement.

P.  For pause menu and view map.

Shift. Go back and exit the game.
